Generaly speaking, if you run win98 or ME, you go to microsoft.com 
and dow=
nload the Japanese language pack. if you run winXP, you turn 
it on somewhe=
re in the control panel. if you run MAC, i have no 
idea.  Regardless, not =
all email programs work with it, so you would 
need to come directly to the=
 yahoo gruop and view the messages as a 
webpage.
